mapper.select:
select NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) from board_file
where title like '%${title}%' or orgFileName like '%${orgFileName}%'
where title like '%${title}%'
where writer like '%${writer}%'

select * from (select result1.*, rownum as rnum from (select num, writer, title, orgFileName, fileSize, downCount, regdate from board_file
where title like '%${title}%' or orgFileName like '%${orgFileName}%'
where title like '%${title}%'
where writer like '%${writer}%'
order by num desc) result1 ) where rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: insert into board_file (num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, downCount, regdate) values(board_file_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize}, #{downCount}, sysdate)
